overview: Some get violent, but these glamorous girls prefer to keep things civil, and use their sexual power to get the revenge they seek. Its a dark game of lust and emotions, but girls like Jaslyn are tired of being stepped on by these men that have reached the last nerve. Watch her take three loads worth of action and still be left hungry and ready for more than anything either of these dudes could provide in, "Sweet Revenge."
title: Sweet Revenge
